code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Listing=_ref=>{let{universities,searchTerm,onSearch,onSort,onDelete}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"University Listing"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search...",value:searchTerm,onChange:onSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onSort,children:"Sort"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:universities.map(uni=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/details",state:{university:uni},children:uni.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(uni.name),children:"Delete"})]},uni.name))})]});};export default Listing;
